summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 SCION XB. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A LETTER FROM THE MANUFACTURER REGARDING EXCESSIVE OIL CONSUMPTION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE CHANGED THE OIL HIMSELF AND DISCOVERED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS MISSING TWO QUARTS OF OIL. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO JEFF WYLER TOYOTA OF CLARKSVILLE (808 E LEWIS AND CLARK PKWY, CLARKSVILLE, IN 47129 (812) 284-2277) WHERE AN OIL CONSUMPTION TEST WAS PERFORMED. THE RESULTS SHOWED NO EXCESSIVE OIL CONSUMPTION ISSUE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER SEVERAL MONTHS LATER FOR A ROUTINE OIL CHANGE AND IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE OIL WAS TWO QUARTS LOW. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 63,248.
